13 FilesDialog::FilesDialog(QWidget *parent) :
14  QDialog(parent), _box(new QMessageBox(this)), _success(false)
15 {
16  _ui.setupUi(this);
17  ros::NodeHandle nh;
18 
19  _client = nh.serviceClient<pmsg::FilesHandler>("file_handler");
20  _client.waitForExistence();
21  QObject::connect(_ui.createFolderButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(createFolder()));
22  QObject::connect(_ui.deleteFileButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(deleteFile()));
23  QObject::connect(_ui.deleteFolderButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(deleteFolder()));
24  QObject::connect(_ui.okButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
25 
26  _ui.createFolderButton->setEnabled(false);
27  _ui.deleteFileButton->setEnabled(false);
28  _ui.deleteFolderButton->setEnabled(false);

36 void FilesDialog::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
37 {
38  QDialog::resizeEvent(event);
39 
40  if (!_path.isEmpty()) {
41  QFontMetrics metrics = _ui.currentFolderLabel->fontMetrics();
42  if (metrics.width(_path) > _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()) {
43  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(metrics.elidedText(_path, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()));
44  } else {
45  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(_path);
46  }
47  }
48 
49  if (!_file.isEmpty()) {
50  QFontMetrics metrics = _ui.currentFileLabel->fontMetrics();
51  if (metrics.width(_file) > _ui.currentFileLabel->width()) {
52  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText(metrics.elidedText(_file, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.currentFileLabel->width()));
53  } else {
54  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText(_file);
55  }

59 void FilesDialog::deleteFile()
60 {
61  _success = false;
62  _msg.request.folder = _path.toStdString();
63  _msg.request.filename = _file.toStdString();
64  _msg.request.service = static_cast<uint8_t>(pmsg::FHST::DeleteFile);
65  if (_client.call(_msg)) {
66  switch (static_cast<pmsg::IOState>(_msg.response.result)) {
67  case pmsg::IOState::OK:
68  _box->setText("File deleted successfully");
69  _success = true;
70  break;
71  default:
72  _box->setText("An error ocurred.");
73  }
74  _box->exec();
75  }
76  if (_success)
77  this->accept();
78  else
79  this->reject();
80 }
81 
82 void FilesDialog::deleteFolder()
83 {
84  _success = false;
85  _msg.request.folder = _path.toStdString();
86  //_msg.request.filename = _file.toStdString();
87  _msg.request.service = static_cast<uint8_t>(pmsg::FHST::DeleteFolder);
88  if (_client.call(_msg)) {
89  switch (static_cast<pmsg::IOState>(_msg.response.result)) {
90  case pmsg::IOState::OK:
91  _box->setText("Folder deleted successfully");
92  _success = true;
93  break;
94  default:
95  _box->setText("An error ocurred.");
96  }
97  _box->exec();
98  }
99  if (_success)
100  this->accept();
101  else
102  this->reject();
103 }

105 void FilesDialog::createFolder()
106 {
107  _success = false;
108  _msg.request.folder = _path.toStdString();
109  _msg.request.filename = _ui.newFolderLine->text().toStdString();
110  _msg.request.service = static_cast<uint8_t>(pmsg::FHST::CreateFolder);
111  if (_client.call(_msg)) {
112  switch (static_cast<pmsg::IOState>(_msg.response.result)) {
113  case pmsg::IOState::OK:
114  _box->setText("Folder created successfully");
115  _success = true;
116  break;
117  default:
118  _box->setText("An error ocurred.");
119  }
120  _box->exec();
121  }
122  if (_success)
123  this->accept();
124  else
125  this->reject();
126 }

128 void FilesDialog::setSelectedFolder(const QString &path)
129 {
130  //ROS_INFO("Selected folder: %s", path.toStdString().c_str());
131  _path = path;
132  _file = QString();
133  if (path.isEmpty()) {
134  /* If path is empty, it means that the folder tree was restarted...
135  * So, all the buttons should be disabled
136  * (this should be like an reseted state)
137  */
138  _ui.createFolderButton->setEnabled(false);
139  _ui.deleteFileButton->setEnabled(false);
140  _ui.deleteFolderButton->setEnabled(false);
141 
142  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText("No file selected.");
143  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText("No folder selected.");
144  } else {
145  /* But, when the folder is selected, theorically, the file is still not selected...
146  * So, we cannot allow yet the user to delete a file
147  */
148  _file = QString();
149  _ui.deleteFolderButton->setEnabled(true);
150  _ui.createFolderButton->setEnabled(true);
151  _ui.deleteFileButton->setEnabled(false);
152 
153  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText("No file selected.");
154 
155  //And now... for the elipsis
156  QFontMetrics metrics = _ui.currentFolderLabel->fontMetrics();
157  if (metrics.width(_path) > _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()) {
158  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(metrics.elidedText(_path, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()));
159  } else {
160  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(_path);
161  }
162  }
163 }
164 
165 void FilesDialog::setSelectedFile(const QString &file)
166 {
167  //ROS_INFO("Selected file: %s", file.toStdString().c_str());
168 
169  //I should do something when the path is empty, but, the way the signals are emmitted,
170  //that sould not be an problem
171  if (!_path.isEmpty()) {
172  _file = file;
173  if (_file.isEmpty()) {
174  _ui.deleteFolderButton->setEnabled(true);
175  _ui.createFolderButton->setEnabled(true);
176  _ui.deleteFileButton->setEnabled(false);
177 
178  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText("No file selected.");
179 
180  //And now... for the elipsis
181  QFontMetrics metrics = _ui.currentFolderLabel->fontMetrics();
182  if (metrics.width(_file) > _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()) {
183  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(metrics.elidedText(_file, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()));
184  } else {
185  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(_file);
186  }
187  } else {
188  _ui.deleteFolderButton->setEnabled(true);
189  _ui.createFolderButton->setEnabled(true);
190  _ui.deleteFileButton->setEnabled(true);
191 
192  //And now... for the elipsis
193  QFontMetrics metrics = _ui.currentFolderLabel->fontMetrics();
194  if (metrics.width(_path) > _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()) {
195  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(metrics.elidedText(_path, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.currentFolderLabel->width()));
196  } else {
197  _ui.currentFolderLabel->setText(_path);
198  }
199 
200  metrics = _ui.currentFileLabel->fontMetrics();
201  if (metrics.width(_file) > _ui.currentFileLabel->width()) {
202  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText(metrics.elidedText(_file, Qt::ElideLeft, _ui.currentFileLabel->width()));
203  } else {
204  _ui.currentFileLabel->setText(_file);
205  }
206  }
207  }
